p: Demonstrating that SARS-CoV can induce TLR-dependent host responses in vivo, Tlr4, Tlr3, and Tram KO mice were shown to be more susceptible to mouse-adapted SARS-CoV, albeit without exhibiting extra mortality ( 71). In comparison, mice deficient for the signaling molecule Trif were highly susceptible to CoV infections, exhibited diminished lung function, aberrant inflammatory responses, and importantly, higher mortality ( 71).
